models.name: Gemini 3 pro
models.subtitle: Latest SOTA model from Google - DeepMind
models.description: Top Gemini model with 1M context. Best for complex reasoning, long documents, and multimodal tasks.

models.name: Gemini 3.0 Flash
models.subtitle: Near 3.0 pro performance at a fraction of the cost
models.description: Fast, cost-efficient variant for real-time apps and high-volume tasks. Strong performance with low latency.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 pro
models.subtitle: Balanced performance and affordability
models.description: Reliable mid-tier Gemini for production workloads. Good reasoning at moderate cost.

models.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
models.subtitle: Cost-effective fast responses
models.description: Optimized for speed and simple tasks. Great for chatbots and lightweight inference.

models.name: GPT-5.2
models.subtitle: OpenAI's SOTA model for professional knowledge work
models.description: The most advanced frontier model, excelling at long-running agents, professional tasks (coding, spreadsheets), and long-context reasoning. Sets new SOTA across key benchmarks.

models.name: GPT 4.1
models.subtitle: OpenAI's advanced reasoning model
models.description: High-performance GPT variant. Excellent for coding, complex analysis, and technical tasks.

models.name: GPT 4o (ChatGPT 4o)
models.subtitle: Fast and capable general-purpose model
models.description: Balanced speed and capability for real-time interactions. Good general-purpose performance.

models.name: Grok 3
models.subtitle: xAI's advanced model with massive context
models.description: 512K context model for large documents and research. Strong math and science capabilities.

models.name: Grok 3 mini
models.subtitle: Lightweight and affordable Grok variant
models.description: Compact model for budget deployments. Good for conversations and basic reasoning.

models.name: Grok 4 fast
models.subtitle: Blazingly fast Grok 4 model
models.description: Speed-optimized for high-volume tasks. 2M context for massive document processing.

models.name: Claude 4.5 Sonnet
models.subtitle: Best-in-class model for coding and long-running agents
models.description: Anthropic's top model for coding and agentic tasks. Excels in software engineering, computer use, and maintains focus on complex tasks for 30+ hours

models.name: Claude 4.0 Sonnet
models.subtitle: Next-generation intelligence from Anthropic
models.description: Advanced reasoning and coding capabilities. 400K context with enhanced safety measures.
